member.name: LSA_AUTH_INFORMATION
member.summary: The LSA_AUTH_INFORMATION structure contains authentication information for a trusted domain.

member.name: LSA_AUTH_INFORMATION.LastUpdateTime
member.summary: A structure that uses the Coordinated Universal Time (Greenwich Mean Time) format to indicate the time that this value was set. For more information about Coordinated Universal Time, see the structure.

summary.para: Specifies one of the following values to indicate the type of authentication information in the AuthInfo buffer.

listheader.description: The format is unknown and will be ignored.

The Windows NT 4.0 one-way format (OWF) of a plaintext password. Note that you cannot derive the clear password back from the OWF form of the password.
The system sets this information.
Plaintext password to use for the trust.

member.name: LSA_AUTH_INFORMATION.AuthInfoLength
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the AuthInfo member.

member.name: LSA_AUTH_INFORMATION.AuthInfo
member.summary: Pointer to an array of bytes that contains the type of authentication information indicated by the AuthType member.
